description: Healthcare spending accounts for a significant portion of gross domestic product and of the federal
budget. It is one of the most consequential, and also one of the most complex, industries in this
country and across the world. This course will examine the structure of American healthcare, the
values explicitly and implicitly embedded in it, and opportunities to improve the system. Offered
annually in spring. Prerequisite: BUS 110 Fundamentals of Business or by permission of the
